welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gilbert, where the charm of a small town meets the convenience of a big city. Explore our vibrant downtown, renowned for its local dining and shopping, and enjoy all the beauty and attractions our city has to offer. We're glad you're here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Scottsdale Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
